# ChangeLog
## v0.3.1
* eBay Merchant services: Partitioned attribute to DS2 cookie, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5962

## v0.3.0
* Fix missing cookie name issue for newly added cookie for eBay Merchant services, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5811

## v0.2.8 
* eBay Merchant services: Requesting for new cookie to propagate guid info, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5711

## v0.2.7
* NodeJS - New cookie support for ebay payments flows for TCG/Goldin users, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5647

## v0.2.6
* COOKIE_BIT lookup by id not available, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5309

## v0.2.4
* Bug fix for Node-4702: NodeJS - Update Cookielet Metadata for DEINESTADT_LAST_VISITED_CITY cookielet in dp1 cookie

## v0.2.3
* Node-4702: NodeJS - Update Cookielet Metadata for DEINESTADT_LAST_VISITED_CITY cookielet in dp1 cookie
